channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI looks to replace the drudgery of junior bankers’ workload
item.description: OpenAI has over 100 ex-investment bankers helping train its AI as part of a secretive project code-named Mercury, according to documents seen by Bloom...

item.title: White House begins demolishing part of the East Wing to build Trump's ballroom
item.description: The White House on Monday started tearing down part of the East Wing, the traditional base of operations for the first lady, to build President Trump'...

item.title: Don’t Blame ICE For Enforcing The Law. Blame Democrats For Breaking It
item.description: Don't blame the enforcement of the law; blame the Democrat lawlessness that made enforcement necessary.

item.title: The Real Plunder Of Europe’s Crown Jewels Was An Inside Job, And It Wasn’t At The Louvre
item.description: The cultural, political, and religious heritage Europe owes to its Christian past was being plundered long before thieves raided the Louvre.

item.title: The Moral Stakes of Trump’s IVF Order
item.description: Babies produced through IVF become cherished members of their families — but there’s no getting around how the process involves the creation and destr...

item.title: Trump Is Right: Nothing He Does Will Get Him Into Heaven — But Jesus Can
item.description: Trump’s confession, however accidental, touches the one truth that no empire can spin: Eternity in heaven or hell is not negotiable.

item.title: US military buildup in Caribbean sees bombers, Marines and warships converge near Venezuela
item.description: Experts call it "21st-century gunboat diplomacy" as U.S. positions strike-capable forces in Caribbean amid tensions with Maduro regime and cartels.

item.title: Democrats Are To Blame For Rising Health Care And Energy Prices
item.description: Green energy and Obamacare are terrible wounds on the American body politic, and Trump deserves great credit for ripping off the bandage.

item.title: State Department blasts Dems over shutdown, says national security at risk amid Senate battle
item.description: The State Department issued a warning that the government shutdown will "impact U.S. foreign policy."

item.title: With legacy on the line, Obama hitting campaign trail to boost Democrats in key governor elections
item.description: Democratic gubernatorial candidates Rep. Mikie Sherrill and former Rep. Abigail Spanberger get Barack Obama's support in tight New Jersey and Virginia...

item.title: We’re Not Having It
item.description: The violence from the left, the attacks on free markets, the rise of antisemitism — NR is fighting these trends, and we hope you’ll support us.

item.title: Dem Rep Mikie Sherrill skips 145 House votes as NJ governor's race heats up
item.description: New Jersey gubernatorial candidate Rep. Mikie Sherrill leads Republican Jack Ciattarelli by just four points, despite missing most House votes.

item.title: Trump vows to reach ‘fantastic deal’ with China, saying the U.S. commands ‘great respect’ from Beijing
item.description: "It’s going to be a great trade deal. It’s going to be fantastic for both countries, and it’s going to be fantastic for the entire world.”

item.title: The Rare Earths Travesty
item.description: It will take us years for the U.S. to make up lost ground in mining critical minerals, but this is a solvable problem.

item.title: The Most Influential Family Advocate You Probably Hadn’t Heard Of
item.description: Karen Wright should be remembered in the pantheon of modern American heroes.

item.title: Defiant Sliwa says 'I am not dropping out' of NYC mayor race: 'Under no circumstance'
item.description: Republican Curtis Sliwa says he will not drop out of the New York City mayoral race, saying threats against him have caused him to get armed security.

item.title: Leftists Overwhelm Small Farm With Death Threats For Hosting Conservative Think Tank
item.description: If Austin’s farm fiasco teaches us anything, it’s that the left’s words aren’t harmless — they’re harbingers of dehumanization and violence.

item.title: Companies pressured by anxious bull market to justify sky-high valuations during crucial earnings season
item.description: As earnings season kicks off, investors want proof that profits, not just optimism, are driving the rally.

item.title: Daylight saving time is about to end—and so is your team’s focus. The extra hour of ‘sleep’ actually tanks productivity, energy levels, and motivation
item.description: Despite President Trump’s calls to scrap daylight saving, it’s still in effect across most of the U.S.—here’s how an expert says workers can stay prod...

item.title: Trump begins demolishing East Wing of the White House to erect a $250 million ballroom that doesn’t have federal approval
item.description: “Nothing will be torn down,” White House Press Secretary Caroline Leavitt said when she announced the project in July.

item.title: Trump’s Argentina Gamble
item.description: Extending money to the South American nation is risky but could help spur reforms that would create a prosperous, powerful American ally.

item.description: North Carolina's legislature formally began redrawing the state's congressional district map Monday, plainly stating their intent to help Republicans ...

item.description: Brazil's government approved on Monday exploratory drilling by state-run oil-giant Petrobras near the mouth of the Amazon River. The decision comes on...

item.title: Congressional leaders admit shutdown won't end anytime soon
item.description: Congressional leaders are acknowledging that the government shutdown has no foreseeable end as both parties refuse to budge.
